trans-unit.source: Creates the service plan for hosting the web app.
trans-unit.target: Creates the service plan for hosting the web app.

trans-unit.source: You provide the name of the plan through the **hostingPlanName** parameter.
trans-unit.target: You provide the name of the plan through the **hostingPlanName** parameter.

trans-unit.target: The location of the plan is the

trans-unit.source: same location used for the web app.

trans-unit.target: The pricing tier and worker size are specified in the **sku** and **workerSize** parameters
